chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: The Prophet of the Dragon, p. 48 (54)—Title given Masema as the self-appointed bringer of the news of the Rebirth of the Dragon. He is not necessarily sane anymore, but has gained a very large following. Rand is getting to the point where he plans to do something about him, but he has not gotten around to it yet with all the other problems he faces. See also Dagar, Masema.
